Chettan paranjathu shari anu. Munpu kure mathapandithanmar parayuka undayi. Mrigamgal polum cheyyan arakunna karyam anu swavargarathi. Pakshe athu thettanennu ee aduthu nhan kanuka undayi. Randu nayakal thammil bhandapedunnathu. Ithu pole nammal kanathu ethrayo undayirikum. Homosexuality arudeyum choice allalo. Athu oru naturality alle. Athu ethra counsel cheythittum maratha oru suhruthine enikk ariyam. Veetukarodu thuranu paranjapo avar polum avane vere reethiyil kanunnu. Pakshe he is very bold. Avan avane polulla oru ale nokukondirikunnu. Avante life avan ishtam ullathu pole jeevikatte. Arkum oru shalyavum undakunilla. Pinne entha.
